description: A secret criminal syndicate and bounty hunting organization operating in the Grand Line. Baroque Works uses a codename system where agents are identified by numbers (Mr. 0-13) and partner designations (Miss with days of the week or holidays). The organization operates through a network of frontier agents who capture pirates for bounties while serving the mysterious goals of their leader.

keyMoments.title: Baroque Works Revealed at Whisky Peak
keyMoments.description: The townspeople of Whisky Peak reveal themselves to be Baroque Works agents operating a bounty hunting operation. They discuss their plan to capture the Straw Hat Pirates for Luffy's 30,000,000 berry bounty.
keyMoments.significance: First major introduction of Baroque Works' methodology and network. Establishes them as an organized threat in the Grand Line.

knownMembers.role: Mayor of Whisky Peak / Undercover agent for Arabasta
Bounty hunter partnered with Miss Wednesday

goals.goal: Capture pirates for bounties to fund organization operations

symbols.description: The organization uses a codename system with numbers and partner designations

reveals.information: Baroque Works uses a codename system where agents are identified by 'Mr.' with numbers and 'Miss' with partner designations
The organization operates fronts like Whisky Peak to lure and capture pirates for their bounties
Baroque Works has established operations at the entrance to the Grand Line, capturing pirates as they enter
